name: INCA LIFE JOURNEY RING (SPONDYLUS)
description: THE INCA COLLECTION - ENGRAVED PURPLE SPONDYLUS RING Featured in Green Living The Spondylus shell is a rare and precious gift from the ocean which was revered by the Incas and used as cultural currency, ceremonial offerings, and referred to as a symbol of guidance. During a trip to the coast of Ecuador bazant asked local Ecuadorian artisans to cut and polish these purple shells which represent the Inca spirit. Each have been engraved with bazant's original interpretation of Inca based motifs symbolizing the journey of life. 18 gauge (1 mm thick) sterling silver wire is shaped, hammered and tumble polished to a lasting shine. • Available in size 7 or 8 • Square measures 2 cm (1") across. • Packaged in a keepsake box Unique jewelry handcrafted in Toronto Canada by Lara Bazant.

name: INCA LIFE JOURNEY EARRINGS (SPONDYLUS)
description:
THE INCA COLLECTION - ENGRAVED PURPLE SPONDYLUS EARRINGS 

The Spondylus shell is a rare and precious gift from the ocean which was revered by the Incas and used as cultural currency, ceremonial offerings, and referred to as a symbol of guidance. During a trip to the coast of Ecuador bazant asked local Ecuadorian artisans to cut and polish these purple shells which represent the Inca spirit. Each have been engraved with bazant's original interpretation of Inca based motifs symbolizing the journey of life.

18 gauge (1 mm thick) sterling silver wire is shaped, hammered and tumble polished to a lasting shine.

• Earring is 9 cm (3.5") long 
• Square is 2 cm (1" ) in diameter 
• Hooks fit pierced ears comfortably and securely
• Attached to an earring card and packaged in a keepsake drawstring pouch

Unique jewelry handcrafted in Toronto Canada by Lara Bazant.

name: BELLAVIA BRACELET IN PINK
description:
THE BELLAVIA COLLECTION - CHUNKY PINK BRACELET

This one of a kind stretchy bracelet features vintage lucite beads from the 1940's, vintage Czech glass, ceramics from Kuching Borneo and Thai hill tribe silver - all hand-picked by the designer.

• Length: 20 cm (8”) 
• Width of largest bead: 2 cm (0.75”)
• Inspired by the designer's long time friend
• Ships with a story tag identifying where the unique materials originated 
• Signed in silver
• Packaged in a keepsake drawstring pouch

Unique jewelry handcrafted in Toronto Canada by Lara Bazant.

name: BELLAVIA NECKLACE IN PINK
description:
THE BELLAVIA COLLECTION - CHUNKY PINK NECKLACE

This one of a kind tapered statement necklace features vintage lucite beads from the 1940's, vintage Czech glass, Thai agate, ceramics from Borneo and Kenya, shell from Ecuador, Italian millefiori and Argentinean rhodolyte. - all hand-picked by the designer. The handcrafted sterling silver extender chain allows you to adjust the piece longer for different necklines. 

• Length: 49.5 cm (19.5”)
• Adjustable to: 60 cm (23.5”)
• Inspired by the designer's long-time friend 
• Includes a story tag identifying where the unique materials originated 
• Packaged in a keepsake drawstring pouch

Unique jewelry handcrafted in Toronto Canada by Lara Bazant.

name: KAZURI BRACELET
description: THE KAZURI COLLECTION - COLORFUL CERAMIC BRACELET Featured in Metro Montréal In Swahili, Kazuri means "small and beautiful". These colorful ceramic beads are made by a community of single mothers just outside of Nairobi, Kenya. The business was set up as a help center for needy women who have no other source of income. Bazant unique adornments is a proud supporter of Fair Trade Certified since 2006. 18 gauge (1 mm thick) sterling silver wire is shaped and hammered to a rounded finish. Black Czech glass beads provide a complementary style. • Full length is 19 cm (7.5") • Width of Kazuri bead is 2 cm (0.75"); width of black glass bead is 1 cm (0.5") • Signed in silver • Ships with a story tag identifying where the unique materials originated • Packaged in a keepsake drawstring pouch • Choose your color from the drop-down menu Unique jewelry handcrafted in Toronto Canada by Lara Bazant.

name: JEWELRY POLISHING CLOTH
description: Keep your sterling silver looking like new with this double sided polishing cloth. If your piece of jewelry gets darker from oxidization, simply rub the metal with one side of the cloth, then the other - and reveal another shiny layer of silver. • Full size is 15 cm x 20 cm (6” x 8”) • Includes protective packaging and instructions For further instructions on silver upkeep visit our Jewelry Care page.
